newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Sept 13.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Sept 13.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following items on the front page of its business section on September 13:
NEW YORK - Gillette Co said it will pay $7 billion for Duracell International Inc, the battery maker.
WASHINGTON - The banking industry wants Congress to approve payments to mortgage brokers for sending them customers who pay high fees for home loans.
WASHINGTON - Ten workers at Giant Food Inc plan to sue the company in a $280 million racial bias suit.
WASHINGTON - Difficult issues remain unresolved in Time Warner's takeover of Turner Broadcasting System.
